alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 12:52PM EST until January 30 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snowfall of 6 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Reduced visibility likely. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern New Hampshire and south central, southwest and western Maine. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of heavy snow and blowing and drifting snow may lead to near whiteout conditions at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
